channel.title: Ottawa Biochar Project
channel.description: Converting wood waste to stable carbon

item.dc:creator: apaliga
item.description: Ottawa produces 80,000 tons of dry tree wate a year, most of which are burnt and give off x CO2 Our mission is to convert this waste stream into renewable energy and a permanently stable form of stored carbon in the form of biochar, a very useful byproduct. This will permanently sequester 700 cars worth...
item.content:encoded:
Ottawa produces 80,000 tons of dry tree wate a year, most of which are burnt and give off x CO2

Our mission is to convert this waste stream into renewable energy and a permanently stable form of stored carbon in the form of biochar, a very useful byproduct. 

This will permanently sequester 700 cars worth of CO2 a year. 

Learn more about biochar and other similar project here here and here.

We are in the information gathering phase of the project. Please contact hello@ottawabiocharproject.com for any question.
